title: muddu koDo
sahitya:
muddu koDo bAro tande rangayya ninna suddi kELidare sAkO krSNayya


caraNam 1    elli huTTidarEno rangayya nInu gollanallanembo siri krSNayya
    caraNam 2    rAyara maneyalli rangayya ninna mAya marmavanu kANe krSNayya
    caraNam 3    aNNa nInu kUDi Ado rangayya nInu buddhivantanAgi iro krSNayya
    caraNam 4    cOranAgadirO rangayya nInu anda tOra bEDa siri krSNayya
    caraNam 5    mAna tera hOga bEDa rangayya avara bhUtamADa bEDa krSNayya
    caraNam 6    tAyi nInu tandanende rangayya avara bAyge anjudi siri krSNayya
    caraNam 7    shrSTi karta bAro tande rangayya nInu purandara viTTalADa krSNayya
